mapper.select: select USER_UID as userUid, ID_PHIEU_MUON as idPhieuMuon, STATUS as status, EXTENDED_TIMES as extended_times, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, BORROW_DATE as borrowDate, RETURN_DATE_ESTIMATE as returnDateEstimate, RETURN_UPDATE_REAL as returnUpdateReal, FINE as fine,CANCEL_DATE as cancelDate, BORROW_DATE_REAL as borrowDateReal from PHIEUMUON where STATUS = #{STATUS} ORDER BY idPhieuMuon DESC

select USER_UID as userUid, ID_PHIEU_MUON as idPhieuMuon, STATUS as status, EXTENDED_TIMES as extended_times, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, BORROW_DATE as borrowDate, RETURN_DATE_ESTIMATE as returnDateEstimate, RETURN_UPDATE_REAL as returnUpdateReal, FINE as fine, CANCEL_DATE as cancelDate, BORROW_DATE_REAL as borrowDateReal from PHIEUMUON where STATUS = #{STATUS , jdbcType = INTEGER } AND USER_UID = #{USER_UID, jdbcType=BIGINT} ORDER BY idPhieuMuon DESC ;

select USER_UID as userUid, ID_PHIEU_MUON as idPhieuMuon, STATUS as status, EXTENDED_TIMES as extended_times, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, BORROW_DATE as borrowDate, RETURN_DATE_ESTIMATE as returnDateEstimate, RETURN_UPDATE_REAL as returnUpdateReal, FINE as fine, CANCEL_DATE as cancelDate, BORROW_DATE_REAL as borrowDateReal from PHIEUMUON where USER_UID = #{USER_UID, jdbcType=BIGINT} and STATUS = #{STATUS , jdbcType = INTEGER } ;
mapper.update: UPDATE PHIEUMUON pm JOIN SACHMUON AS sm ON pm.ID_PHIEU_MUON = sm.ID_PHIEU_MUON JOIN SACH AS s ON sm.BOOK_ID = s.BOOK_ID SET pm.STATUS = 1, BORROW_DATE_REAL = NOW(), RETURN_DATE_ESTIMATE = DATE_ADD(NOW(), INTERVAL 14 DAY) WHERE pm.ID_PHIEU_MUON = #{idPhieuMuon} ;
mapper.select: select distinct USER_UID as userUid from PHIEUMUON where status = #{STATUS}

SELECT COUNT(s.BOOK_ID) AS 'countBook' FROM PHIEUMUON AS pm JOIN SACHMUON AS sm ON pm.ID_PHIEU_MUON = sm.ID_PHIEU_MUON JOIN SACH AS s ON sm.BOOK_ID = s.BOOK_ID Where pm.ID_PHIEU_MUON = #{idPhieuMuon} GROUP BY pm.ID_PHIEU_MUON;

select USER_UID as userUid, ID_PHIEU_MUON as idPhieuMuon, STATUS as status, EXTENDED_TIMES as extended_times, CREATED_DATE as createdDate, BORROW_DATE as borrowDate,FINE as fine, CANCEL_DATE as cancelDate, RETURN_DATE_ESTIMATE as returnDateEstimate, RETURN_UPDATE_REAL as returnUpdateReal, BORROW_DATE_REAL as borrowDateReal from PHIEUMUON where STATUS = #{STATUS} ORDER BY idPhieuMuon DESC limit 5 offset #{ignore};
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PHIEUMUON WHERE STATUS = #{status} ;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PHIEUMUON where STATUS = #{status , jdbcType = INTEGER } AND USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=BIGINT};
